verses.verse: Now <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, and <S%H203>On<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6431>Peleth<s%>, <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> men:

And they rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, with <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>assembly<s%>, <S%H7148>famous<s%> in the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H8034>renown<s%>:

And they gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Ye take too <S%H7227>much<s%> upon you, seeing all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> are <S%H6918>holy<s%>, every one of them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> them: wherefore then lift ye <S%H5375>up<s%> yourselves above the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>?
And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, he <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%>:

And he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and unto all his <S%H5712>company<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Even to <S%H1242>morrow<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3045>shew<s%> who are his, and who is <S%H6918>holy<s%>; and will cause him to come <S%H7126>near<s%> unto him: even him whom he hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> will he cause to come <S%H7126>near<s%> unto him.
This <S%H6213>do<s%>; <S%H3947>Take<s%> you <S%H4289>censers<s%>, <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, and all his <S%H5712>company<s%>;

And <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2004>therein<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> in them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow<s%>: and it shall be that the <S%H376>man<s%> whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth <S%H977>choose<s%>, he shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%>: ye take too <S%H7227>much<s%> upon you, ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%>, I pray you, ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>:

Seemeth it but a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> unto you, that the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H914>separated<s%> you from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to bring you <S%H7126>near<s%> to himself to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto them?
And he hath brought thee <S%H7126>near<s%> to him, and all thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> with thee: and <S%H1245>seek<s%> ye the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> also?

For which <S%H3651>cause<s%> both thou and all thy <S%H5712>company<s%> are gathered <S%H3259>together<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and what is <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, that ye <S%H3885%H3885>murmur<s%> against him?

¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab<s%>: which <S%H559>said<s%>, We will not come <S%H5927>up<s%>:

Is it a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, except thou <S%H8323>make<s%> thyself <S%H8323>altogether<s%> a <S%H8323>prince<s%> over us?

<S%H637>Moreover<s%> thou hast not <S%H935>brought<s%> us into a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, or <S%H5414>given<s%> us <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>: wilt thou put <S%H5365>out<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%>? we will not come <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>wroth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H6437>Respect<s%> not thou their <S%H4503>offering<s%>: I have not <S%H5375>taken<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%> from them, neither have I <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, Be thou and all thy <S%H5712>company<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou, and they, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, to <S%H4279>morrow<s%>:

And <S%H3947>take<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> in them, and <S%H7126>bring<s%> ye <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer<s%>, two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H4289>censers<s%>; thou also, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H376>each<s%> of you his <S%H4289>censer<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in them, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> thereon, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.

And <S%H7141>Korah<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> against them unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H914>Separate<s%> yourselves from <S%H8432>among<s%> this <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them in a <S%H7281>moment<s%>.

And they <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon their <S%H6440>faces<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H410>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, shall <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%>, and wilt thou be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>?
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Get you <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, <S%H1885>Dathan<s%>, and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> unto <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>; and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H310>him<s%>.

And he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5493>Depart<s%>, I pray you, from the <S%H168>tents<s%> of these <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H5060>touch<s%> nothing of theirs, lest ye be <S%H5595>consumed<s%> in all their <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

So they gat <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, <S%H1885>Dathan<s%>, and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>, on every <S%H5439>side<s%>: and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of their <S%H168>tents<s%>, and their <S%H802>wives<s%>, and their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and their little <S%H2945>children<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Hereby ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H4639>works<s%>; for I have not done them of mine own <S%H3820>mind<s%>.

If these men <S%H4191>die<s%> the common <S%H4194>death<s%> of all <S%H120>men<s%>, or if they be <S%H6485>visited<s%> after the <S%H6486>visitation<s%> of all <S%H120>men<s%>; then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath not <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

But if the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1254>make<s%> a new <S%H1278>thing<s%>, and the <S%H127>earth<s%> <S%H6475>open<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and swallow them <S%H1104>up<s%>, with all that appertain unto them, and they go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2416>quick<s%> into the <S%H7585>pit<s%>; then ye shall <S%H3045>understand<s%> that these <S%H582>men<s%> have <S%H5006>provoked<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
¶ And it came to pass, as he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, that the <S%H127>ground<s%> clave <S%H1234>asunder<s%> that was under them:

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and swallowed them <S%H1104>up<s%>, and their <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and all the <S%H120>men<s%> that appertained unto <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, and all their <S%H7399>goods<s%>.

They, and all that appertained to them, went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> into the <S%H7585>pit<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3680>closed<s%> upon them: and they <S%H6>perished<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%>.

And all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were round <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H5127>fled<s%> at the <S%H6963>cry<s%> of them: for they <S%H559>said<s%>, Lest the <S%H776>earth<s%> swallow us <S%H1104>up<s%> also.

And there came <S%H3318>out<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H559>Speak<s%> unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that he take <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H4289>censers<s%> <S%H996>out<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%>, and <S%H2219>scatter<s%> thou the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1973>yonder<s%>; for they are <S%H6942>hallowed<s%>.

The <S%H4289>censers<s%> of these <S%H2400>sinners<s%> against their own <S%H5315>souls<s%>, let them <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H7555>broad<s%> <S%H6341>plates<s%> for a <S%H6826>covering<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: for they <S%H7126>offered<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, therefore they are <S%H6942>hallowed<s%>: and they shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H4289>censers<s%>, wherewith they that were <S%H8313>burnt<s%> had <S%H7126>offered<s%>; and they were made <S%H7554>broad<s%> plates for a <S%H6826>covering<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

To be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H834%H4616>that<s%> no <S%H376%H2114>stranger<s%>, which is not of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, come <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H6999>offer<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; that he be not as <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, and as his <S%H5712>company<s%>: as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to him by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ But on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye have <S%H4191>killed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And it came to pass, when the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was <S%H6950>gathered<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, that they <S%H6437>looked<s%> toward the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and, behold, the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Get you <S%H7426>up<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> this <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them as in a <S%H7281>moment<s%>. And they <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon their <S%H6440>faces<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H4289>censer<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> therein from <S%H6440>off<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> on <S%H7004>incense<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> unto the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them: for there is <S%H7110>wrath<s%> gone <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; the <S%H5063>plague<s%> is <S%H2490>begun<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>commanded<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>congregation<s%>; and, behold, the <S%H5063>plague<s%> was <S%H2490>begun<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and he <S%H5414>put<s%> on <S%H7004>incense<s%>, and made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> between the <S%H4191>dead<s%> and the <S%H2416>living<s%>; and the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%>.

Now they that <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4046>plague<s%> were <S%H702%H6240>fourteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, beside them that <S%H4191>died<s%> about the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%>.
